artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of two belt buckles on the left; in the center a woman in a white gown with green trim, green fan, a bouquet of blue, yellow, and purple flowers at the bust, and a white hat with blue, yellow, and purple flowers and tall green foliage; on the right two women shown from the waist up in elaborate hats
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Vingt-cinquième Cahier, 20 Juillet 1788
